StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CloseO.cerMissingDocuments]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID integer, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
UPDATE MISSING_DOCUMENTS SET MISSING_DOCUMENTS.STATUS = 'Closed-Drop', MISSING_DOCUMENTS.USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, MISSING_DOCUMENTS.UPDATE_DATE = getdate() FROM NWA INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT C ON (NWA.NWA_ID = @NWAID AND NWA.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID) WHERE MISSING_DOCUMENTS.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID
